body_text: What was L's real name? What was L's real name, or did he never have one (it was never said)? I watched through Death Note once, and I never remember hearing his name, even after he died.

In Death Note, is it ever revealed what "L" stands for? In Season 2, we meet L's successors, "M" (Mellow) and "N" (Near). Seeing how they are his successors and were all raised in the same institute, L must also stand for something.
